actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for a portion of any dividend received by a domestic corporation from a qualified foreign corporation.

summary.text: Financial Transactions Equity Act of 2004 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction for a certain percentage of the dividends received by a U.S. domestic corporation from a corporation organized under the laws of the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for a portion of any dividend received by a domestic corporation from a qualified foreign corporation.
